Monitoring Promotes Accountability ® Linking Sobriety with Technology Soberlink is a comprehensive alcohol monitoring system. Combining a breathalyzer with wireless connectivity, Soberlink automatically documents proof of sobriety in real-time which gives clients a sense of accomplishment while rebuilding trust with others. Adaptive Facial Recognition technology Real-time text message reminders and Alerts Soberlink devices use facial recognition technology to confirm identity during each breath test. BAC results are wirelessly transmitted in real-time via Verizon's Private Network to Soberlink's cloud-based recovery management software. The Soberlink System allows for custom testing schedules, as well as specific notification and automated report settings. Automated Reminders and Alerts Text message reminders for Clients Email/text message Alerts for designated Contacts Automated overview Reports – daily, weekly, monthly Internal device sensors dedicated to tamper detection Proprietary technology flags inconsistencies with human breath Government-grade facial recognition software Adapts to subtle appearance changes Reduces manual process of test photo review Reliability You Can Trust The FDA cleared Soberlink system has multiple patents and is a registered medical device in the state of California. Soberlink devices are manufactured in the USA. Every device passes through rigorous testing and upholds the highest manufacturing certifications: ISO 9001, 14001, 13485, AS9100, and OHSAS18001 certified by UL-DQS ITAR registered (M16646).
